00025 CQueue &CQueue::Create(unsigned portBASE_TYPE uxQueueLength, unsigned portBASE_TYPE uxItemSize) {
00026        assert(!IsValid());
00027 
00028        xQueueHandle handle;
00029 
00030        handle = xQueueCreate(uxQueueLength, uxItemSize);
00031        if (handle != NULL)
00032               Attach(handle);
00033 
00034        return *this;

00037 void CQueue::Attach(xGenericHandle handle) {
00038        assert(handle != NULL);
00039 
00040        if (IsValid())
00041               Delete();
00042 
00043        m_handleQueue = handle;
00044 }
00045 
00046 void CQueue::Delete() {
00047        if (m_handleQueue != NULL) {
00048               vQueueDelete(m_handleQueue);
00049               m_handleQueue = NULL;
00050        }
